mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weekly_report (user_id, week_start_date, week_end_date, content, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{weekStartDate}, #{weekEndDate}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE weekly_report SET content = #{content}, week_start_date = #{weekStartDate}, week_end_date = #{weekEndDate}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, week_start_date, week_end_date, content, create_time, update_time FROM weekly_report WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY week_start_date DESC
